byline.contributor: Josh Kron contributed reporting from Kampala, Uganda, and Isabel Kershner and Irit Pazner Garshowitz from Jerusalem.

abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu tours Kenya as part of four-country tour of Africa to rebuild economic and strategic ties.
lead_paragraph: The Israeli prime minister is on a four-country tour, hoping to rebuild economic and strategic ties on a continent where his nation was once a major presence.

headline.main: In Africa, Benjamin Netanyahu Looks for Friends, and U.N. Votes, for Israel
headline.print_headline: In Africa, Netanyahu Seeks Friends, and U.N. Votes, for Israel

snippet: The Israeli prime minister is on a four-country tour, hoping to rebuild economic and strategic ties on a continent where his nation was once a major presence....
